strains.name: Golden Teacher
strains.blurb: Balanced visuals and introspection with glowing euphoria.
strains.details: Golden Teacher offers a classic, uplifting experience with warm euphoria, gentle visuals, and a reflective headspace.

strains.name: Full Moon Party
strains.blurb: High-energy social boost with bright visuals and creative flow.
strains.details: Full Moon Party enhances sociability, creativity, and sensory vividness — a perfect choice for social settings or high-energy environments.

strains.name: Penis Envy
strains.blurb: Deep introspection, strong body sensations, and emotional depth.
strains.details: Penis Envy is one of the most potent strains, offering intense introspection, powerful body energy, and ego-deepening experiences.

strains.name: Enigma
strains.blurb: Transcendent, dream-logic visuals with shifting perception.
strains.details: Enigma produces surreal, Inception-like visuals and non-linear thought patterns. A deeply immersive, mind-bending strain.

strains.name: Cambodian
strains.blurb: Clean, energetic clarity with a grounded emotional profile.
strains.details: Cambodian is known for its bright clarity and stable mood lift — minimal body load, highly functional, and great for daytime exploration.

strains.name: Amazonian
strains.blurb: Energizing uplift with earthy emotional tones and enhanced focus.
strains.details: Amazonian boosts energy, motivation, and sensory awareness while maintaining a grounded emotional center.
